metadata.name: Pnscan Binary Data Transmission Activity
metadata.comment: Detects command line patterns associated with the use of Pnscan for sending and receiving binary data across the network. This behavior has been identified in a Linux malware campaign targeting Docker, Apache Hadoop, Redis, and Confluence and was previously used by the threat actor known as TeamTNT

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND process.cmd_line rlike '-\(W|R\)\\s?\(\\s|"|'\)\(\[0-9a-fA-F\]\{2\}\\s?\)\{2,20\}\(\\s|"|'\)')
